abstract: This year’s Pictures of the Year International contest recognizes the work of photographers on daily newspaper assignments or long-term projects to recognizing new ways of visual storytelling.
lead_paragraph: Pete Muller was named Photographer of the Year in the 74th Pictures of the Year International competition, for a portfolio that largely explores concepts of masculinity. Marcus Yam of The Los Angeles Times was named Newspaper Photographer of the Year.
snippet: This year’s Pictures of the Year International contest recognizes the work of photographers on daily newspaper assignments or long-term projects to recognizing new ways of visual storytelling....

headline.main: Winners of Pictures of the Year International
